title: Kim Kardashian Trolls Kanye West With ANOTHER Sleeping Snap!
text:
Kim Kardashian really loves to capture her husband in his element, which is anywhere he can nap.

The "KUWTK" star delighted fans by posting another hilarious photo of Kanye West sleeping on Friday, this time in bed.

Related:

Kanye West 'Sunday Service' Trademark Shut Down Over Christly Confusion

Kanye West Breathes Life Into 'Yandhi' Amid Delay of 'Jesus Is King'

Kanye West Pushes Back The Release Date Of His New Album 'Jesus Is King'

Kanye West Settles Legal Battle With Music Publisher EMI Over Record Deal

Kanye West Heading to Trial in $600,000 Yeezy Battle

Sleepy Mr. West!

View photos

Kanye is seen napping in his white t-shirt and gold chain with the covers pulled up high.

Their oldest daughter, North West, appears to be sleeping next to him or being like mom and poking fun at Dad.

Also pictured with Kanye seems to be the newest addition to their family, the Wests' black Pomeranian puppy.

Frequent Napper!

View photos

Kim has shared several snaps of sleepy Kanye over the years.

The most iconic probably being that time he passed out while baby shopping at a luxury kids store in Beverly Hills with Chrissy Teigen and John Legend.

In the pic, the KKW founder showed Kanye passed out in a rocking chair while North slept on a small sofa next to him.

"Kanye & North were a little too quiet. We found them passed out in the middle of the store. TheRealLifeOfPablo," his wife captioned the funny snap.

Passed Out Pablo!

View photos
description: Kanye doing what he does best.
